Package com.intellij.ui

Class JBSplitter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • com.intellij.openapi.ui.Splitter
              • com.intellij.ui.JBSplitter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Splittable, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OnePixelSplitter

    public class JBSplitter
extends Splitter
    Major difference between the parent class and JBSplitter is an ability to save proportion.
    See Also:
    Splitter, Serialized Form
